definitions.definition: An assessment , such as an annual personnel performance review used as the basis for a salary increase or bonus, or a summary of a particular situation.
examples: The result of the semestral evaluation will go towards your final score.

definitions.definition: A completion of a mathematical operation; a valuation .
Determination of the value of a variable or expression .

main_definition: An assessment , such as an annual personnel performance review used as the basis for a salary increase or bonus, or a summary of a particular situation.
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) A completion of a mathematical operation; a valuation .
( computing , programming ) Determination of the value of a variable or expression .
